name: my-zap-links
description: Create and manage custom short links for quick access to your favorite sites.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf artifacts && rm -f artifacts/my-zap-links.zip
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p artifacts
scripts.build: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/* dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run package
